## Focus

My work focuses on **head and neck squamous cell carcinoma (HNSCC)**, with an emphasis on **multi-omics** and **single-cell** analysis to answer clinically relevant questions.

## Grants & projects

### Prognostic model for brain metastasis based on hematological markers (MZGC20230020)
- **Role:** PI
- **My contributions:** End-to-end participation including data collection, model development, statistical analysis, and manuscript writing.
- **Period / budget:** 2023-06 to 2024-06; 20,000 RMB

### CAF-mediated EGFR-TKI resistance in HNSCC (2024ZYD0054)
- **Role:** First key researcher
- **My contributions:** In vitro/in vivo experiments, model construction, and data analysis.
- **Period / budget:** 2024-09 to 2025-08; 300,000 RMB

### AI-driven neoantigen prediction & mRNA vaccine development for HNSCC (2025YFHZ0087)
- **Role:** Key participant (lead analyst)
- **My contributions:** Data analysis, model development, and neoantigen prediction.
- **Period / budget:** 2025-01 to 2025-12; 200,000 RMB
